# wisesaying-contract
* hardhat + openzeppline을 이용한다. 
* 메타데이터와 어셋은 온체인상에 존재해야 한다.
* ERC721 표준 NFT를 구현한다.

# sepolia network 
contract address : 0xD4dFF05B21dC713CCd3eabf5A6fF4CB12E0Ce387  
etherscan : https://sepolia.etherscan.io/address/0xD4dFF05B21dC713CCd3eabf5A6fF4CB12E0Ce387  

#  Minted ERC721
![wisesayingcard-demo2](https://github.com/JungByungOk/wisesaying-contract/assets/14744923/be55c5bb-6f05-4e92-a58a-374e02d33f44)

# metadata
function tokenURI(uint256 tokenId) 호출 결과  

```
data:application/json;base64,
```

# metadata decoding
```
{
    "name": "Wise Saying Card #0",
    "description": "When the card is flipped, it is an NFT card that can check the saying.",
    "image": "data:text/html;base64,"
}
```

# settings & compile

```

git> git clone https://github.com/JungByungOk/wisesaying-contract.git  
git/wisesaying-contract> npm update  
git/wisesaying-contract> export API_URL=<alchemy or infura>  
git/wisesaying-contract> export PRIVATE_KEY=<metamask sepolia account -> privatekey>

git/wisesaying-contract> npx hardhat compile
    Downloading compiler 0.8.19
    Compiled 20 Solidity files successfully

```

# remix ide 이용한 상호작용
![remix-demo](https://github.com/JungByungOk/wisesaying-contract/assets/14744923/5ca6699d-ff04-4795-9992-0f5fb2a4ac26)

# Interacting programmatically

```
컨트랙트 상태 정보 조회
> npx hardhat run ./scripts/interactions/state.js --network sepolia

신규 민팅
> npx hardhat run ./scripts/interactions/minting.js --network sepolia

전체 메타데이터 조회
> npx hardhat run ./scripts/interactions/metadata.js --network sepolia
```

# hardhat console interaction

지원이 잘 안되는거 같은???

```
npx hardhat console --network sepolia
    Welcome to Node.js v18.16.0.
    Type ".help" for more information.
    >
    > const contract = await (await ethers.getContractFactory("WiseSaying")).attach("0xD4dFF05B21dC713CCd3eabf5A6fF4CB12E0Ce387")
```
